EXTRACTED VALUE: Al Thornton (ankle) did not play on Monday and no return date has been set.
Aaron Gray was back in the lineup Wednesday night after missing Monday due to a gastro-intestinal infection.
Will Bynum has been ruled out for Tuesday due to a hamstring injury.
Coach Paul Westphal said he thinks Carl Landry can be one of the best sixth men in the league.
Kevin Durant (knee) is listed as day-to-day.
Joakim Noah had 17 points, 15 rebounds and five assists in Wednesday's double OT win over the Suns.
According to beat writer Mike Wells, Josh McRoberts is expected to continue starting at power forward.
The Magic have told backup center Marcin Gortat that they won't hesitate to add him to a trade that would bring back a big star.
Kyrylo Fesenko left Monday's game briefly to get four stitches, and he will return to the game shortly.
Thaddeus Young scored 15 points on 7-of-8 shooting (including a three) with four rebounds and one assist in 24 minutes off the bench on Tuesday.
Spencer Hawes, who doesn't appear to be injured, played just six minutes for three points on Friday.
Luis Scola scored 13 points on 5-of-14 shooting in Sunday's victory, adding six rebounds, one steal, one block, and five turnovers.
Rodney Stuckey called his benching for disciplinary reasons last week's news, and will play Sunday against the Warriors.
C.J. Watson (quad) returned to action on Tuesday night.
Jeff Green, who aggravated his previously-injured ankle in Friday's game, missed Saturday's practice and is questionable for Sunday's game.
Shawne Williams made the Knicks' regular season roster, thanks to his slimmed-down frame and improved shooting.
The Spanish team Caja Laboral has released Pops Mensah-Bonsu, possibly because of a knee injury.
Marco Belinelli scored 18 points on 6-of-9 shooting (with four 3-pointers) to go with three rebounds, no assists, and one steal on Saturday.
Dominic McGuire (stress fracture in shin) practiced for the first time since training camp on Wednesday.
Aaron Brooks (ankle) was cleared to remove his protective boot Sunday.
Julian Wright saw his playing time taken down to 23 minutes on Thursday, and he finished with just two points, two rebounds, two assists, and a block.
Corey Brewer's contract will not be extended by the Wolves for the 2011-12 season, making him a restricted free agent.
Nick Young (bruised thigh) will be inactive for Friday's game vs. the Trail Blazers.
Jamario Moon hit 4-of-8 shots and two 3-pointers for 10 points, five rebounds, an assist, a steal and block in Wednesday's win.
Wilson Chandler scored just 10 points on 2-of-6 shooting with two rebounds, one assist, and two blocks in 19 minutes off the bench on Saturday.
The Grizzlies signed PG Mike Conley to a five-year $45 million extension on Monday.
Yi Jianlian (knee) is expected to practice on Wednesday.
